properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arpintu prabhuva na jivitam samarthyamu gala ni cetilo, Ninnu mahima paraca arhapatraga ceyumunan (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne mattini nivu kummarivi ni samarthya hastamulevu (2) Ayogyatalanni tolaginci ni korke coppuna nannu ceyu, Ninnu mahimaparaca goritin prabhuva, Yogya patraga ceyumunan (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne anacabadina cinna cettun mundla podala madhya Paditin, dhanasukha asala dvara anacabaditini nenu, Nanundi mundlanu tiyumu prabhuva, Nurantaluga ne phaliyimpa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
